<MethodEndpoint

Returns a list of chain hashes supported by this drand node, which can be used to query chain-specific endpoints.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of chain hashes","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[0-9a-fA-F]{64}$"},"description":"An array of hexadecimal chain hashes.","example":["52db9ba70e0cc0f6eaf7803dd07447a1f5477735fd3f661792ba94600c84e971","8990e7a9aaed2ffed73dbd7092123d6f289930540d7651336225dc172e51b2ce","04f1e9062b8a81f848fded9c12306733282b2727ecced50032187751166ec8c3"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
